Text.Page:
Before we can move on the {@Rgn:50006}, we need to clear out the arzakaars guarding it.

Take what forces you need and pave a path with their bodies. I'll draw up plans for a follow-on assault.

That hurt the argons, but they'll reinforce soon enough.

I sent a request for troops from Kaiator. Still haven't heard back.

That's the military for you. Hurry up and wait.
